metadata.dc:title: dna-electrons: A Python Package for Calculating Total Electron Counts in DNA Sequences
metadata.dc:creator: Yash Munnalal Gupta
metadata.dc:subject: DNA
Python
electron density
bioinformatics
computational biology
molecular modeling
quantum chemistry
FASTA
metadata.dc:description: DNA electronic properties play a crucial role in understanding biological processes at the quantum level. The dna-electrons Python package provides accessible computational tools for calculating electron densities in nucleotide sequences, enabling researchers to analyze DNA structure and charge transfer with ease.
metadata.dcterms:bibliographicCitation: Gupta, Y. M. (2025). dna-electrons: A Python Package for Calculating Total Electron Counts in DNA Sequences. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17347432
